alert.note: Alert for Cherry; Grant; Hooker (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 28 at 6:53PM CDT until May 28 at 7:15PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 615 PM MDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN CHERRY...GRANT AND NORTHWESTERN HOOKER COUNTIES... At 552 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 11 miles south of Hyannis, or 18 miles north of Arthur, moving north at 35 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. Locations impacted include... Hyannis, Whitman, Carr Lake, Green Lake, Duluth, Hire, Whitman Road crossing the North Branch of the Middle Loup River, Pratt Lake, Spring Valley Lake, Cogill Lake, Weir and Mother Lake. This includes the following highways... Highway 2 between mile markers 140 and 173. Highway 61 between mile markers 139 and 178. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
